results.title: Dr. No
results.creator_credit: United Artists, Eon Productions, Danjaq, Richard Maibaum, Johanna Harwood, Berkely Mather, Ken Adam, Albert R. Broccoli, Harry Saltzman and Terence Young
results.headline_credit: United Kingdom and United States of America, 1962
results.brief_description: In 1962, audiences were introduced to the suave super spy James Bond in the first instalment of the classic franchise, <.i>Dr. No. Bond, James Bond has since shot up the screen 25 times and become a pop-culture icon.

constellations_other.name: Gunslingers, good fellas and flea bags
constellations_other.description: Explore how a 1903 western changed the course of filmmaking and videogames by breaking the fourth wall.

results.creator_credit_for_label: United Artists, Eon Productions, Danjaq, Richard Maibaum, Johanna Harwood, Berkely Mather, Ken Adam, Albert R. Broccoli, Harry Saltzman and Terence Young
results.headline_credit_for_label: United Kingdom and United States of America, 1962
results.description: In the film that launched the James Bond saga, Agent 007 battles mysterious Dr. No, a scientific genius bent on destroying the U.S. space program. As the countdown to disaster begins, Bond must go to Jamaica, where he encounters beautiful Honey Ryder, to confront a megalomaniacal villain in his massive island headquarters.
description_for_label: In the film that launched the James Bond saga, Agent 007 battles mysterious Dr. No, a scientific genius bent on destroying the U.S. space program. As the countdown to disaster begins, Bond must go to Jamaica, where he encounters beautiful Honey Ryder, to confront a megalomaniacal villain in his massive island headquarters.

results.title: Cowboy Bebop
results.creator_credit: Sunrise, SUNRISE, Bandai Visual, Sound Box, Kazuhiko Ikeguchi and Masahiko Minami
results.brief_description: Set in 2071 and centered on the adventures of a gang of bounty hunters in space, Cowboy Bebop delves into the unresolved issues of the protagonists’ past, exploring concepts such as existentialism, boredom, loneliness and the past.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Sunrise, SUNRISE, Bandai Visual, Sound Box, Kazuhiko Ikeguchi and Masahiko Minami
results.description: In 2071, roughly fifty years after an accident with a hyperspace gateway made the Earth almost uninhabitable, humanity has colonized most of the rocky planets and moons of the Solar System. Amid a rising crime rate, the Inter Solar System Police (ISSP) set up a legalized contract system, in which registered bounty hunters (also referred to as “Cowboys”) chase criminals and bring them in alive in return for a reward.
description_for_label: In 2071, roughly fifty years after an accident with a hyperspace gateway made the Earth almost uninhabitable, humanity has colonized most of the rocky planets and moons of the Solar System. Amid a rising crime rate, the Inter Solar System Police (ISSP) set up a legalized contract system, in which registered bounty hunters (also referred to as “Cowboys”) chase criminals and bring them in alive in return for a reward.

video_links.name: Cowboy Bebop HD - Trailer - Complete Series on Blu-ray - Coming Soon

results.title: Zootopia
results.creator_credit: Walt Disney Animation Studios, Byron Howard, Rich Moore, Phil Johnston, Jared Bush and Cory Loftis
results.brief_description: Determined to prove herself, Officer Judy Hopps, the first bunny on Zootopia’s police force, jumps at the chance to crack her first case - even if it means partnering with scam-artist fox Nick Wilde to solve the mystery.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Walt Disney Animation Studios, Byron Howard, Rich Moore, Phil Johnston, Jared Bush and Cory Loftis
results.description:
Walt Disney Animation Studio’s Academy Award-winning Zootopia (2016) follows a rookie cop who sets out to uncover a dangerous conspiracy that’s turning the peaceful animals of Zootopia back into their savage states. A small-town bunny rabbit, Judy Hopps (Ginnifer Goodwin) has to work with the sly fox Nick Wilde (Jason Bateman), a hustler who can guide her through the city’s underworld to get to the bottom of the case.

This concept sketch by Cory Loftis represents the bustling metropolis teeming with instantly classic animal characters, including Judy and Nick, but also Chief Bogo (Idris Elba), Benjamin Clawhauser (Nate Torrence), Dawn Bellwether (Jenny Slate) and Yax (Tommy Chong).

Winner of the Academy Award for Best Animated Feature, as well as the Golden Globe, Critic’s Choice Movie Award and the Annie Award, Zootopia was critically acclaimed for its memorable characters, animation and story about seeing past our prejudices.
description_for_label:
Walt Disney Animation Studio’s Academy Award-winning Zootopia (2016) follows a rookie cop who sets out to uncover a dangerous conspiracy that’s turning the peaceful animals of Zootopia back into their savage states. A small-town bunny rabbit, Judy Hopps (Ginnifer Goodwin) has to work with the sly fox Nick Wilde (Jason Bateman), a hustler who can guide her through the city’s underworld to get to the bottom of the case.

This concept sketch by Cory Loftis represents the bustling metropolis teeming with instantly classic animal characters, including Judy and Nick, but also Chief Bogo (Idris Elba), Benjamin Clawhauser (Nate Torrence), Dawn Bellwether (Jenny Slate) and Yax (Tommy Chong).

Winner of the Academy Award for Best Animated Feature, as well as the Golden Globe, Critic’s Choice Movie Award and the Annie Award, Zootopia was critically acclaimed for its memorable characters, animation and story about seeing past our prejudices.

results.title: Xena: Warrior Princess
results.brief_description: Xena is an infamous warrior on a quest to seek redemption for her past sins against the innocent. Accompanied by her comrade-in-arms Gabrielle, the couple use their formidable fighting skills to help those who are unable to defend themselves.

constellations_other.name: Boom mics, Clara Bow and musicals
constellations_other.description: The microphone was called the "terror of the studios" when sound films were introduced in the late 1920s, but after initial resistance Hollywood fully embraced the new technology.

constellations_other.name: Television and creative constraint
constellations_other.description: Making art for the screen is dependent on time, resources, and infrastructure. Where technology could have posed a barrier, these television producers saw an opportunity, instead.

results.description: Xena is an infamous warrior on a quest to seek redemption for her past sins against the innocent. Accompanied her comrade-in-arms Gabrielle, the campy couple use their formidable fighting skills to help those who are unable to defend themselves.

results.title: Workout
results.brief_description: Jane Fonda’s Workout is the original VHS workout program. The program includes a 30 minute beginners’ class and a 60 minute advanced session. Fond would go on to release 23 different home workout videos and sell more than 17 million copies.

constellations_other.name: Technology and work
constellations_other.description: How does the godfather of animation and sprocket technology connect to Jane Fonda workout videos and a Jesus biopic?

results.description: Jane Fonda’s Workout is the original VHS workout program, inspired by her best-selling book. The program includes a 30-minute beginners’ class and a 60-minute advanced session. Fonda would go on to release 23 different home workout videos and sell more than 17 million copies.
description_for_label: Jane Fonda’s Workout is the original VHS workout program, inspired by her best-selling book. The program includes a 30-minute beginners’ class and a 60-minute advanced session. Fonda would go on to release 23 different home workout videos and sell more than 17 million copies.

results.title: Workers Leaving the Lumière Factory
results.creator_credit: Lumière, Auguste Lumière and Louis Lumière
results.brief_description: The film La Sortie des Usines Lumière à Lyon (Workers Leaving the Lumière Factory in Lyon, 1895) by the Lumière brothers is 45 seconds long and is considered one of the first motion pictures ever made.

constellations_other.name: Technology and work
constellations_other.description: How does the godfather of animation and sprocket technology connect to Jane Fonda workout videos and a Jesus biopic?

results.description: Working men and women leave through the main gate of the Lumière factory in Lyon, France. Filmed on 22 March 1895, it is often referred to as the first real motion picture ever made, although Louis Le Prince’s 1888 Roundhay Garden Scene pre-dated it by seven years. Three separate versions of this film exist, which differ from one another in numerous ways. The first version features a carriage drawn by one horse, while in the second version the carriage is drawn by two horses, and there is no carriage at all in the third version. The clothing style is also different between the three versions, demonstrating the different seasons in which each was filmed. This film was made in the 35 mm format with an aspect ratio of 1.33:1, and at a speed of 16 frames per second. At that rate, the 17 meters of film length provided a duration of 46 seconds, holding a total of 800 frames.
description_for_label: Working men and women leave through the main gate of the Lumière factory in Lyon, France. Filmed on 22 March 1895, it is often referred to as the first real motion picture ever made, although Louis Le Prince’s 1888 Roundhay Garden Scene pre-dated it by seven years. Three separate versions of this film exist, which differ from one another in numerous ways. The first version features a carriage drawn by one horse, while in the second version the carriage is drawn by two horses, and there is no carriage at all in the third version. The clothing style is also different between the three versions, demonstrating the different seasons in which each was filmed. This film was made in the 35 mm format with an aspect ratio of 1.33:1, and at a speed of 16 frames per second. At that rate, the 17 meters of film length provided a duration of 46 seconds, holding a total of 800 frames.

results.title: Workers Leaving the Factory
results.creator_credit: Harun Farocki Filmproduktion, Harun Farocki, Christian Baute and Heinrich Mis
results.brief_description: In this documentary essay based on the Lumière brothers groundbreaking film, Harun Farocki uses to provide an insight into the changes both in work and film through motion pictures of workers leaving factories across the years.

constellations_other.name: Technology and work
constellations_other.description: How does the godfather of animation and sprocket technology connect to Jane Fonda workout videos and a Jesus biopic?

results.creator_credit_for_label: Harun Farocki Filmproduktion, Harun Farocki, Christian Baute and Heinrich Mis
results.description: Based on the first film recording – workers leaving the Lumière factory – Farocki provides an insight in the changes into both the phenomenon of work and film through pictures of workers leaving factories across the years.
description_for_label: Based on the first film recording – workers leaving the Lumière factory – Farocki provides an insight in the changes into both the phenomenon of work and film through pictures of workers leaving factories across the years.

results.title: Wonderstruck
results.brief_description: The story of a young boy in the Midwest is told simultaneously with a tale about a young girl in New York from fifty years ago as they both seek the same mysterious connection.

constellations_other.name: Making films in black and white
constellations_other.description: Oscar-winner Sandy Powell crafted Abigail's (Emma Stone) costume in The Favourite to represent her ascension in the royal household of Queen Anne by utilising black and white.

results.title: Women Without Shadows
results.brief_description: A series of interviews which try to establish the current role of the woman in the Saudi society in relation with the recent past.

constellations_other.name: VFX to fantasy and freedom
constellations_other.description: Founded in Sydney, and now with offices worldwide, Animal Logic are an Academy Award-winning VFX and animation studio whose job is to bring the impossible to life. And they're in good company with these other artists and filmmakers.

results.title: Wind River
results.brief_description: An FBI agent teams with the town’s veteran game tracker to investigate a murder that occurred on a Native American reservation.

constellations_other.name: Women, crime and literature
constellations_other.description: Judy & Punch draws on a classic puppet show that's been reframed by director Mirrah Foulkes as a feminist tale, much like the works that put women at the centre in this Constellation.

results.description: An FBI agent teams with the town’s veteran game tracker to investigate a murder that occurred on a Native American reservation.
